title: Left click barely working in game
body:
As in the title my left click just suddenly stopped working in game. Attack move doesnt work since left clicking works 1 out of 10 times when i click, same goes for manual warding etc.
I have been looking around for answers but so far any of those havent worked for me. Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body:
Unless there is an issue with your mouse itself, this could be a problem with your config.  I suggest a config reset to see if that does the trick!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps.
